paper_abstract: This paper shows by an example that Lemma 2 in Wang and Elhag [On the normalization of interval and fuzzy weights, Fuzzy Sets and Systems 157 (2006) 2456-2471] is false and presents the modified lemma and the correct proof of Theorem 5. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Note on "On the normalization of interval and fuzzy weights"
